snippet.title: 1630 - The Thirty Years' War | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We're excited to announce our new game, which takes you on a journey back in time to the 17th century Holy Roman Empire during the Thirty Years War. In this game, you'll have the opportunity to play as two factions: the Imperials and the Swedish. You also receive reinforcements from various European powers including Sweden, France, Spain, and Denmark, as well as from the numerous principalities of the Holy Roman Empire that were involved in the war.

Website: https://1630game.com/ 
Kickstarter: https://bit.ly/3Z01egT
Steam: https://bit.ly/3YdqxuH

The game features a historical campaign that follows the events of the Thirty Years' War, allowing you to experience key battles and make strategic decisions that impact the outcome of the conflict. And for those who like to explore the nooks and crannies of a game, we've included some side missions that give you a view into the culture, society, morality and strife of the general populace.

To make things even more exciting, the game offers an expansive army roster. You can organize your armies with different units, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. Players engage in battles using infantry armed with pikes and muskets, canons for destroying enemy fortifications, and cavalry for chasing down retreating enemy troops.
